word:
"I saw that many have taken advantage of what God has shown in regard to the sins and wrongs of others. They have 
                                                                           670
taken the extreme meaning of what has been shown in vision, and then have pressed it until it has a tendency to weaken the faith of many in what God has shown, and also to discourage and dishearten the church." [VOL. 1, P. 166 (1857).]
